db:abstract.db:para: Controls layers Drawn in a frame graph branch.
This class was introduced in Qt 5.5.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: A Qt3DRender::QLayerFilter can be used to instruct the renderer as to which layer(s) to draw in that branch of the frame graph. The Qt3DRender::QLayerFilter selects which entities to draw based on the Qt3DRender::QLayer instances added to the QLayerFilter and as components to the Qt3DCore::QEntity.

db:section.db:title: [explicit] QLayerFilter::QLayerFilter(Qt3DCore::QNode *parent = nullptr)
db:section.db:para: The constructor creates an instance with the specified parent.

db:section.db:title: void QLayerFilter::addLayer(Qt3DRender::QLayer *layer)
db:section.db:para: Add layer to the current list of layers

db:section.db:title: QVector<Qt3DRender::QLayer *> QLayerFilter::layers() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the current list of layers

db:section.db:title: void QLayerFilter::removeLayer(Qt3DRender::QLayer *layer)
db:section.db:para: Remove layer from the current list of layers
